questions.question: Soils containing large amount of Lumic materials are

explanations.a: Lumic materials influence pH but don't always make soil neutral.
explanations.c: Correct, Lumic materials can act as both acids and bases.

questions.question: An example of soil sediment is

explanations.a: Ammonium is a nutrient ion, not a sediment.
explanations.b: Correct, CaCO₃ is a common soil sediment (lime).
explanations.c: Palladium is not typically found in soils.
explanations.d: Nitrate is a dissolved ion, not a sediment.

questions.question: Soil Electrical Conductivity is commonly expressed in

explanations.a: Incorrect, 'Siemen' is not commonly used in this context.
explanations.b: Correct, traditional unit for soil EC.
explanations.c: Also used, but less commonly in soil science.
explanations.d: Ohms per meter is a unit of resistance, not conductivity.
